description.en: There will be some surprises at the booth !
description.zh-TW: 到攤位會有精彩任務哦

您可以至各攤位與廠商互動，完成攤位主的小任務，同時持 App 提供您的 QR code 給個攤位主。
而在經過攤位主認證掃描後，即視為完成戳章集點，當您集完所有攤位的戳章後，就能參與「 抽獎活動 」來獲得 「 天瓏書局 」所贊助的精選書籍，同時我們每天也會抽出兩名的特別獎哦！而我們將在第二天和第三天早上以及第三天中午公佈獲獎人名單哦！（附註：抽獎資格：每天集滿一定數量的章就可以抽獎了哦！若第一天要獲得抽獎機會的話，需累積集滿6個章；第二天的話需累積集滿12個章；而第三天則要累積集滿14個章哦！而且得獎名單不會重複喔！）
description.en:
You can interact with the sponsors at each booth to complete small quests. Meanwhile, you can also provide your QR code to the booth owner with the App. After being scanned by the booth owner, it will be regarded as completing the stamp collection.
And after you collect the stamps of all the booths, you can participate in the "raffle" to win the select books sponsored by the "天瓏書局(Tenlong Bookstore)”. Besides, we'll draw two lucky people to win the special prizes. The list of winners will also be announced on the second and third mornings and at noon on the third day! ( Note => Draw Qualification: You only need to draw a certain amount of stamps a day ! For the first day, you need to collect 6 stamps, and cumulatively collect 12 stamps on the second day,  and also cumulatively collect 14 (all) stamps on the last day. Besides, the winners won't be repeated !)
